channel.title: How do i?
channel.description: i know this is a very nooby question but on the char files when i go to the skills can someone tell me what each number is? E.G. [code]character-skill = 0 99 14010950[/code]

item.title: How do i?
item.dc:creator: @Imnotokkk Imnotokkk
item.description:
@Imnotokkk wrote:

.< damn well in all mine it looks like.

[SKILLS] character-skill = 0 99 506266000 character-skill = 1 99 14930000 character-skill = 2 99 500930000 character-skill = 3 99 504933155 character-skill = 4 99 500930000 character-skill = 5 99 14930000 character-skill = 6 99 501821000 character-skill = 7 99 486000000 character-skill = 8 99 486000000 character-skill = 9 99 486000000 character-skill = 10 99 486000000 character-skill = 11 99 486000000 character-skill = 12 99 486000000 character-skill = 13 99 486000000 character-skill = 14 99 486000000 character-skill = 15 99 486000000 character-skill = 16 99 486000000 character-skill = 17 99 486000000 character-skill = 18 99 486000000 character-skill = 19 99 486000000 character-skill = 20 99 486000000 character-skill = 21 99 486000000 character-skill = 22 99 486000000 character-skill = 23 99 486000000 character-skill = 24 99 486000000
ok i take that back… the character-skill = 0 is the skill number and 99 = lvl the other numbers = xp

Read full topic

item.title: How do i?
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

[quote=“Imnotokkk, post:2, topic:250019”]Should be more like

character-skill =  99	14010950

The 99 being the level (1-99) the other long number being the XP[/quote]

That’s what it says…

@OP

public int playerAttack = 0; public int playerDefence = 1; public int playerStrength = 2; public int playerHitpoints = 3; public int playerRanged = 4; public int playerPrayer = 5; public int playerMagic = 6; public int playerCooking = 7; public int playerWoodcutting = 8; public int playerFletching = 9; public int playerFishing = 10; public int playerFiremaking = 11; public int playerCrafting = 12; public int playerSmithing = 13; public int playerMining = 14; public int playerHerblore = 15; public int playerAgility = 16; public int playerThieving = 17; public int playerSlayer = 18; public int playerFarming = 19; public int playerRunecrafting = 20;

item.title: How do i?
item.dc:creator: @Asante213 Asante213
item.description:
@Asante213 wrote:

Skill 0= attack
skill 4= Health

All I Know Just Like Boost Up Each 1 Of Your Stats Like Attack A Monster Using Str. And Which Ever Boosts Up when you go into your character file it should beh str.

Lets say skill 1 was 0exp
attack a monster and it says Congras you gained str. blah blah
Then you go to your character txt file see which 1 boosted up in the case It just so happen to be skill 1 and now skill 1=strength

Read full topic

Should be more like

The 99 being the level (1-99) the other long number being the XP
